settings.showNewChangelogsOnLoad.name: Show New Changelogs on Load
settings.showNewChangelogsOnLoad.hint: This will show any unseen changelogs when the wold loads up.
settings.useSourceInsteadofSchema.name: Use Source Instead Of Schema
settings.useSourceInsteadofSchema.hint: The module schema by default limits author links to name, email, url and discord. Using the source file instead will pull any additional values the author has listed.
settings.defaultIcons.name: Add Default Icons
settings.defaultIcons.hint: Adds font icons for Javascript, CSS and Compendium
settings.condenseDefaultTags.name: Condense Default Tags
settings.condenseDefaultTags.hint: Hides the text of default tags and will only show the icon for that tag.
settings.condenseTags.name: Condense Module Credits Tags
settings.condenseTags.hint: Hides the text of tags from Module Credits if it isn't an extrenal source. *(Only show Icons)*
settings.condenseCompatibilityRisk.name: Condense Compatibility Risk Tag
settings.condenseCompatibilityRisk.hint: Replaces the text of the Compatibility Risk Tag with a Triangle Explanation Mark.
settings.condenseVersion.name: Condense Version Tag
settings.condenseVersion.hint: Replaces the Version Text with the First Character then Version Numbner. eg `V.0.0.3`
settings.condenseAuthors.name: Condense Author Tags
settings.condenseAuthors.hint: If a module contains more then one author, it will display an icon instead of the name. Clicking on this icon will show all authors and their respective values in order.
settings.showReadme.name: Add Wiki Tag
settings.showReadme.hint: If the module contains the `readme` property, this will add a clickable tag that will take you to that url
settings.fetchLocalReadme.name: Fetch Local Readme
settings.fetchLocalReadme.hint: Allow module credits to search module directories for local `readme.md` files.
settings.showIssues.name: Add Issues Tag
settings.showIssues.hint: If the module contains the `bugs` property, this will add a clickable tag that will take you to that url
settings.showChangelog.name: Add Changelog Tag
settings.showChangelog.hint: If the module contains the `changelog` property, this will add a clickable tag that will take you to that url
settings.fetchLocalChangelogs.name: Fetch Local Changelog
settings.fetchLocalChangelogs.hint: Allow module credits to search module directories for local `changelog.md` files.

module-credits.resetDialog.name: Reset Tracked Changelogs
module-credits.resetDialog.hint: Confirming this reset, will set all changelogs to unseen.
module-credits.text.readme.name: wiki
module-credits.text.issues.name: issues
module-credits.text.changelog.name: changelog
